description: '''Eric Isaac Utere''', known professionally as '''LeriQ''', is a [[Nigerian]] record producer and songwriter. He is currently signed to [[Spaceship Records]], through [[Spaceship Collective]]. He achieved recognition for his work on [[Burna Boy]]'s 2012 single Like To Party, and went on to produce the singer's debut album ''[[L.I.F.E]]'' (2013), and ''[[Twice as Tall]]'' (2020), which earned him an award at the [[63rd Annual Grammy Awards|63rd Grammy ceremony]].
